  • Constructor Details

    • Card

      public Card(Color color, String type, int number, Game game)
      Constructor for Card objects.
      Parameters:
      color - shows the color. Type of the parameter is Color
      type - shows which type this Card belongs to. There are 6 types which are number, +2, reverse, skip, +4, wild.
      number - shows the number of number cards. Number of other cards are -1.
      game - shows the game this card belongs to.

    • doCardsAgree

      public static boolean doCardsAgree(Card previouscard, Card newcard)
      This method shows that if a card matches other card.
      Parameters:
      previouscard - must be the top card on the discard pile.
      newcard - must be the card which player wants to discard.
      Returns:
      true if Cards match. returns false if cards do not match.

    • colorToString

      public static String colorToString(Color color)
      this method is for turning five Card colors into type string.
      Parameters:
      color -
      Returns:
      string of that color.

    • stringToColor

      public static Color stringToColor(String string)
      this method is for turning five Card colors's string names into type Color.
      Parameters:
      string - either Black, Green, Blue, Red, Yellow.
      Returns:
      Color type of that color

    • makeCardShowableButton

      public void makeCardShowableButton()
      This method makes a CardButton for a Card. Then assigns it to this.ShowableButton This method is used only for Main Player's Cards.
